summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of the Comptroller; the reappropriation and transfer of funds reserved in the Finance General account to the General Fund for the purpose of implementing the CIP/Bond Fund reporting enhancements in CFMS and to estimate the cost of enhancing CFMS to accommodate proprietary fund accounting; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1985 budget of said department; and establishing an Accountant position for one year to assist in entering prior years' bond fund information.
